description.p: A Connection_of_individual_product is a connection relationship between individual products.
A connection between products indicates that matter, energy, mechanical load or information can be transferred between them.

example.p: Pump P_1001 is an individual product. Pipe FW_1001 is an individual product.
The relationship between pump P_1001 and pipe FW_1001, that indicates one is connected to the other, is a connection_of_individual_product.
The connection between individual pump P_1001 and individual pipe FW_1001 can be classified as a 'pump suction pipe connection'.

note.p: This entity is identical to connection_of_individual in ISO 15926-2, where the relationship is between individual products.

explicit.name: related_version
explicit.description: a Product_as_individual that is connected as side 1.
